headline: Synchrony Financial (SYF): Evaluating Valuation After Latest Credit Portfolio Disclosure in Form 8-K
summary: Synchrony Financial (SYF) has just issued its latest set of monthly charge-off and delinquency figures, covering data through October 2025 in its Form 8-K. These updates often draw attention because they offer a window into shifts in credit quality and lending portfolio health. See our latest analysis for Synchrony Financial. Synchrony’s steady flow of portfolio updates comes as the stock has quietly gained momentum over the past year, with a 12% share price return year-to-date and a total...
